video.headline: Carlos Leal punishes Alex Morono, forces ref to stop fight
video.caption: Carlos Leal lays a flurry of punches on Alex Morono in the prelims of UFC 313 to grab the TKO win.
video.title: Carlos Leal punishes Alex Morono, forces ref to stop fight
video.description: Carlos Leal lays a flurry of punches on Alex Morono in the prelims of UFC 313 to grab the TKO win.

video.headline: Brunno Ferreira grabs huge win over Armen Petrosyan
video.caption: Brunno Ferreira submits Armen Petrosyan for the finish in the prelims of UFC 313.

events.name: UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev
events.note: Light Heavyweight - Main Event - Title Fight

video.headline: Magomed Ankalaev defeats Alex Pereira to become new light heavyweight champ
video.caption: Magomed Ankalaev quiets the Las Vegas crowd as he beats Alex Pereira via unanimous decision to become the new UFC light heavyweight champion.
video.title: Magomed Ankalaev defeats Alex Pereira to become new light heavyweight champ
video.description: Magomed Ankalaev quiets the Las Vegas crowd as he beats Alex Pereira via unanimous decision to become the new UFC light heavyweight champion.

tracking.trackingName: MMA_One-Play (Magomed Ankalaev defeats Alex Pereira to become new light heavyweight champ) 2025/03/08 ESHEET
